document_data.name: Velvorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Velvorn''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was on the older side.
document_data.Activities: He numbered amongst [[Caladnei]]'s closer associates by {{yearlink|1373}}.
document_data.History: One night in the early spring of 1373 DR, after the raid on the [[Rightful Conspiracy]] in [[Marsember]], the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]] Caladnei was visited by [[Elminster Aumar]] to request her presence elsewhere. One of the people who arrived to protect her was Velvorn. He was dismissed by Caladnei, after some deliberation.
